ruleContent.content:
<js>
writersay = java.getString("#colorpanelwritersay@html");
paperid = baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code = result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:"";
url = book.origin+"showpapercolor.php,";
body = "paperid="+paperid+"&vercodechk="+code;
option = {
	"method": "POST",
	"body": String(body)
	};
content = java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));
content = content.match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]{10,}/)?content:"ÈúÄÁôªÂΩïÊàñËÄÖË¥≠‰π∞";
Content = content+writersay
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: .byline@a@text
ruleBookInfo.name: .preface@h2@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) È°µ/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) È°µ/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'Á¨¨'+i+'È°µ',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
}

list
